query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Case studies of women leading RHC market uptake
result.description: A report presenting the case studies of women driving RHC market uptake in business, policy and society developed under the framework of Task 1.3. The report will also outline the methodology employed for the development of the case studies as well as the findings from their comparative analysis.

result.description: A report presenting the objectives, methodology and findings of the analysis conducted under Task 1.2. result.title: Statutes, Interinstitutional agreement and strategic plan for SMART-ER Institute
result.description: Statutes, Inter-institutional Agreement and Strategic Plan for the SMART-ER Institute (Month 36):1.1. Mission1.2. Management structures1.3. Strategic Plan aligned with the Shared SDG11 R&I Agenda1.4. Affiliation Regulation1.5. Research groups selection procedure and criteria1.6. Incentives and Recognition Plan for Researchers.1.7. Transformation model1.8. Impact model1.9. Intermediate roles1.10. Intermediate processes1.11. ”Pillar-specific” co-creation platforms for sustainable cities and communities1.12. Authorities responsible for challenge-specific co-creation research platforms constituting Virtual Research Arenas in collaboration with stakeholders

result.title: Project Newsletter
result.description:
Three newsletters (M6, M18, M36) will be produced, designed, and edited in English, Spanish and Basque and distributed to the target audience, using email, social media, handouts and weblinks. All partners will feature in each newsletter and provide copy and updates on activities that are transferable and will appeal to a wider audience.
Language: English, Spanish, Basque.
